results.name: Department 42: The Mystery of the Nine

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS XP SP2/VISTA
  • Processor: PENTIUM 4 1.5 GHZ/ATHLON XP
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 64 MB DIRECTX 9 COMPATIBLE
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 137 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS XP SP2/VISTA
  • Processor: PENTIUM 4 3.0 GHZ/ATHLON XP
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB DIRECTX 9 COMPATIBLE
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 137 MB available space

Minimum:

  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

results.name: SaGa 2: Hihou Densetsu: Goddess of Destiny

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 6th gen / AMD Ryzen
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP Service pack 3 or any newer Windows OS
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB RAM on Desktop, 1GB on certain Laptops. Integrated videocards not fully supported.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Widescreen capable monitor (16:9) required. The game produces unreliable performance on Laptops due to integrated video chips, a home computer is recommended.
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB RAM desktop GFX.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Widescreen capable monitor (16:9) required.
